item.title: Founding Icy Seas Co-Lab
item.description: Although Icy Seas Co-Lab has been around in one form or another for the past couple of years, just recently we decided to take the full step of incorporating into Icy Seas Co-Laboratory LLC. We did this for two reasons: adaptability and teamwork. By distancing ourselves from university activities, we gain adaptability with respect to the projects we take on, the timeframe between project start and project conclusion, and allow for a wider variety of services. Similarly we find that Icy Seas Co-Laboratory can be a better partner and be more responsive to colleagues, clients, and community members as a primary business.
